entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 20.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 early in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 20. Humidex 25. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
